title: Miami Heat Overcome the Celtics to Face the Lakers in the NBA Finals | Real Ones
description:
On today’s newly dubbed 'Real Ones,' Logan and Raja discuss Miami’s monster victory over the Celtics in Game 6 to win the Eastern Conference finals and go through to the Finals (3:23) and the Finals matchup between the Lakers and Heat (35:05). Then noted Celtics fan Jackson Safon of The Ringer’s video team joins to pour out some liquor for his Celtics (58:46) and Jordan Ligons from The Ringer’s copy desk joins to talk about everything that’s happening in the Wubble (1:06:25). Finally, Logan and Raja each award their Real One of the Week (1:18:08).

Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell

Guests: Jackson Safon and Jordan Ligons
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
